name: CameraVR
description:
CameraVR is a desktop VR app, an experience inside a virtual camera and its components in which one can explore  the environment, interact with the tools, understand how they works and try to take some pictures and put into practice what learnt.

A Unity project by: Chemin Davide, Leo Oscar, Bertolotti Lorenzo for the 2020/21 Virtual Reality course at Politecnico di Torino.
